changes.change: Adjusted mirv_replace_name to CS2 update.
Adjusted mirv_colors teamid to CS2 update - toggle sv_teamid_overhead 0/1 to update.
changes.comments: Please note that usage of HLAE with external VConsole is not recommended, even though it's common with observers. (There's bugs in regards for that, for us it even crashes frequently, even when using without HLAE.) If you only need netconport you can use -afxFixNetCon launch parameter to make it work without VConsole.

changes.change: Fixed mirv_fix animations 1 causing (a lot of) duplicate particles / shells.
Adjusted to CS2 update / fixed mirv_input camera FOV related problems, thanks to @1mpulse
Fixed mirv_colors teamid not updating like before when toggling sv_teamid_overhead false/true.
Fixed vtable offsets for render eye origin and angles (also affects e.g. mirv_deathmsg localPlayer xTrace) and offets for origin.
Fixed bug in player pawn and player controller detection / vtable offset affecting multiple features.
Fixed crash bug in mirv_replace_name.
Adjusted to latest CS2 update, thanks to @1mpulse for helping.

Fixed reported / used demo tick and time (e.g. in mirv_campath print / mirv_skip). HLAE now assumes a hard-coded interval per tick of 1s/64, since for some new demos the ticks per second reported seem bogus.
Fixed mirv.script Entity.getClientClassName thanks to @ChetdeJong
Adjusted mirv_replace_name to CS2 update.

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Adjusted to CS2 update, with lots of support by @ChetdeJong

Attention mirv-script users: breaking change in mirv.onClientFrameStageNotify: Valve changed e.curStage value 9 to value 8. We updated the example script accordingly. Also we temporarily hardcoded the highest entity index reported to 2048 (there are even higher numbers), will probably need an API change here in the future.

release.comments: This release is best effort, there might still be (new) problems, please report them in issue tracker (or Discord).

changes.change: Adjusted to CS2 update, #1065 by @ChetdeJong
Improved mirv_replace_name a bit. (Does not replace chat messages, use tv_nochat true)
Fixed #1059 CS2: issue with animations fix by @ChetdeJong
Fixed #1060 CS2: Crashes when trying to add a non-existing stream template
Fixed bug introduced in mirv_deathmsg name replacement feature (would always use attacker name).
Added #1057, team effort with @ChetdeJong: mirv_fix animations 0|1 - Enable/disable fix for smooth animations (Default: 0).
Attention mirv-script users, we made updates / corrections you might want to apply to your own project: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/commit/eb9111185d48d21bdb1144c2ba301bf0c6332220

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Added #1049 mirv_replace_name
Added #1052 / improved mirv-script examples (https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/tree/main/misc/mirv-script) by @ChetdeJong
Fixed #1053 mirv-script examples bug: wsConnection wsInBuffer should be FIFO instead of LIFO, thanks @ChetdeJong
Fixed #1051 mirv_script_load for .mjs should follow import rules and thus cache the entry module.
Fixed #1054 CS2: mirv_input fov 0 crashes.

release.comments:
mirv-script users:
1. Carefully evaluate your existing projects, that fix of #1051 (mirv_script_load for .mjs should follow import rules and thus cache the entry module), doesn't break your projects before updating.
2. We recommend to apply fix #1053 (mirv-script examples bug: wsConnection wsInBuffer should be FIFO instead of LIFO) to your existing projects.

changes.change: Add to mirv-script: mirv.getCurTime, mirv.getDemoTick, mirv.getDemoTime by @ChetdeJong
Fixed mirv_streams frames dropped / missing.
Fixed mirv_streams depth stream not properly working due to missing shader input layout (AMD), thanks to ghettoboi for testing.
Adjust to latest CS2 update by @ChetdeJong
Fix captureType rgba and clearBeforeUi options in mirv_streams.
Fix globally shared mirv_streams settings not applying correctly on newly added streams.

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Updated depth stream defaults.
Fixed smoke depth composition bugs.
Fixed mirv_streams captureType depth24 / depthF not working (OpenEXR).
Fixed crashes with ReShade (6.4.1).

release.comments: When using ReShade, then ReShade 6.4.1 and ReShade_advancedfx.addon 1.4.1 are tested with and recommended for this version.

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Added fake mirv_streams, so you can capture depth and e.g. colors before Panorama UI at same time. Adds mirv_streams add, mirv_streams edit, mirv_streams print, mirv_streams remove. Each stream has a number of options that we will try to describe in the Manual / WIKI with a few examples.
Added better depth for ReShade and mirv_streams.

Added (optional, default on) smoke depth compositing for mirv-streams and ReShade. For this to work well a smoke full-res pass is forced in default settings when using ReShade or when recording a stream with depth.

release.comments: Thanks to Rikki 'eirisocherry' for input and helping with testing in the early stages.

changes.change: Added mirv_endofmatch by @ChetdeJong - default is 1 (enabled), set to 0 to disable the scene in the end of match/demo.
mirv-script: fixed #1032 mirv.onAddEntity and mirv.onRemoveEntity.
Updated mirv-script engine to Boa JS 0.20, exposed console object, internal changes.
Minor fixes changes in mirv_campath help text.

Added mirv_colors by / thanks to @ChetdeJong to complement mirv_deathmsg colors: set custom colors to glow, teamid_overhead (player info over heads), smokes and grenades trails (also allows to set width of trails). The game doesn't update these values instantly: Glow updates when switching spectate mode or when changing spectated player. Same applies to teamid_overhead, but it can also be updated by switching sv_teamid_overhead off/on. Trails color applies only on it's creation, same for smokes.
Fixed mirv_fix time.
mirv-script changes / fixes, thanks @ChetdeJong
Fixed #1009 CS2: mirv-script crashes game when loading modules.
Added mirv_loadlibrary DLL loading command.
mirv-script updates in repositiory, thanks @ChetdeJong
Added mirv_script_point snippet, thanks @ChetdeJong
Added mirv_fix time (auto enabled) to CS2. (Fixes Panorma UI and Scene System (e.g. water shader) time when recording with mirv_streams.) Thanks @ChetdeJong
Added mirv_noflash, thanks @ChetdeJong
Added mirv_fov.
Adjust to latest CS2 update, thanks @ChetdeJong
Adjust to latest CS2 update, thanks @ChetdeJong

BREAKING CHANGE: Changed / fixed D3D11 context hooking. This will require updating ReShade_advancedfx to 1.3.0 or newer (only if you use ReShade_advancedfx), otherwise the ReShade_advancedfx.addon will cause a crash!

Fix a few reshade bugs - depth stencil with smokes, capture fx, thanks @Markxy and @allstar-gaming-llc - The skybox will disappear from depth stencil if smoke is in view. After Oct 2 "Armory" patch, smokes will disappear from depthStencil if too far with default cvars. Use mirv_cvar_unhide_all; smoke_volume_lod_ratio_change 0 to have them in depth stencil from afar.
Fix another bug with localplayer.
Fix wrong spec keys.
Added -afxFixNetCon command-line parameter: Thanks to @dumbasPL (https://github.com/ValveSoftware/csgo-osx-linux/issues/3603#issuecomment-2163695087)
Adjusted to Oct 4 2024 CS2 update.
Added fix #993 for bug with local player in mirv_deathmsg in AfxHookSource2, thanks @ChetdeJong
Fixed engine to client interface again (affecing e.g. mirv_cmd or script mirv.exec) (thanks @akiver).
Fixed #989 mirv_viewmodel doesnt work on latest HLAE/CS2 (thanks @ChetdeJong).
Fixed #988 Movie recording failed - Missing expected pixels error.
Fixed #990 no audio file when recording with mirv_streams in CS2.
Fixed #991 ticks / DemoIsPaused not detected properly in CS2.
Adjusted to Oct 2 2024 CS2 update.
Added mirv_streams record campath 0|1. Set to 1 to save current campath to take folder (if not empty).
Fixed bug in mirv_streams record that would lead to missing frames.
Updated and fixed things in mirv-script.
Adjusted to CS2 update, by @ChetdeJong.
Added mirv_deathmsg, by @ChetdeJong. For details see https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/wiki/Source2%3Amirv_deathmsg
Fixed mirv_input camera not working when using demoui in in-eye mode.
Fixed mirv_campath draw not working under some conditions.
Adjusted to CS2 update, with help by @ChetdeJong.
Updated mirv_viewmodel (* is now a true passthrough setting), by @ChetdeJong.
Fixed viewmodel for AMD graphics when using ReShade_advancedfx ReShade addon.
Added #952 mirv_streams record cam, by @ChetdeJong.
Added #955 mirv_viewmodel, by @ChetdeJong.
Fixed mirv_campath draw enabled 1 not working anymore.
Added mirv_reshade command for https://github.com/advancedfx/ReShade_advancedfx (enabled by default when present).
Adjustes to CS2 update.
Fixed mirv_input raw input mouse wheel handling.
Fixed mirv_input iteration of raw input buffer, causing troubles e.g. when using AutoHokey.
Fixed unwanted VK_ADD / VK_SUBSTRACT passthroughs in mirv_input.
Added raw keyboard handling to mirv_input. Fixes #946 CS2: issue with binds in mirv_input camera.
Adjusted to CS2 update.
Added new features to mirv-script.
Fixed a few things in mirv-script.
Improved parameters in HLAE interfaces advancedfx/advancedfx#944

Added mirv_script_exec, mirv_script_load - interface to first version mirv-script features (currently mostly only useful for maybe feeding additional data to HUDs over a websocket). Huge thanks to @ChetdeJong for helping with the mirv-script example. The example can currently be found in misc/mirv-script folder of advancedfx/advancedfx repositiory.
Added mirv_campath hold.
Adjusted to CS2 update.
Adjusted to CS2 update: Fixes #932 Camera Swapped when adding new one.
Added #926 command line launch option -afxDisableSteamStorage for disabling Steam cloud syncing (useful to be combined with USRLOCALCSGO environment variable).
Fixed #925 Unicode HLAE print bug in CS2.

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: mirv_streams record now detects the host_framerate or sets it if mirv_streams record fps is set accordingly.
mirv_streams record now sets engine_no_focus_sleep 0 during recording.
mirv_streams record now sets r_always_render_all_windows true during recording.

Tried to fix HLAE crashing e.g. when FACEIT is not disabled; Pleae note, we strongly recommend to instead disable FACEIT anti cheat by clicking the tray icon and selecting disable service (newer versions have that option) instead.

release.comments: Don't forget: mirv_streams record screen enabled 1 - before recording, otherwise you will only get audio.

changes.change:
Added mirv_streams record, mirv_streams settings for simple screen-recordings. Set mirv_streams record fps - before starting to record, it will be used to set the host_framerate for the recording. The output is in the folder where cs2.exe is located.
Front-ends startmovie for audio. This feature is still experimental, e.g. if the device is reset / resolution changed during recording there will be problems, also if game is quit while recording, there will be problems.
Added: mirv_input cfg stepFactor - to set the speed multiplier.
Fixed #906 CS2 update: mirv_campath draw broken. The 3rd attempt.
Fixed #906 CS2 update: mirv_campath draw broken. Again.
Fixed wrong ticks e.g. in mirv_campath print etc.
Fixed #905 CS2 update: mirv_input camera mouse (rawinput) broken.
Fixed #906 CS2 update: mirv_campath draw broken.
Fixed #886 mouse3 mis-configured.
Added #817 mirv_input local axis movement.
Fixed #893 CS2 / CS:GO e.g. mirv_campath load takes a long time.
Fixes #890 Flickering with mirv_campath draw in CS2 at high FPS.
Fixes #887 CS2: mirv_ commands do not work randomly.
Added #880 CS2: mirv_campath draw.
Fixed #888 CS2: mirv_cmd will only work once (not detect level change).

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Adjusted to latest CS2 update.

release.comments: While we believe that Valve addressed the issue of -insecure not working in CS2 in some circumstances, we are not sure, so please make sure to not connect to live CSTV servers or game servers in order to avoid a VAC ban! Watching demos is fine.

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Fixes #884 OBS studio crashing.

release.comments: While we believe that Valve addressed the issue of -insecure not working in CS2 in some circumstances, we are not sure, so please make sure to not connect to live CSTV servers or game servers in order to avoid a VAC ban! Watching demos is fine.

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Adjusted to latest CS2 update.

release.comments: While we believe that Valve addressed the issue of -insecure not working in CS2 in some circumstances, we are not sure, so please make sure to not connect to live CSTV servers or game servers in order to avoid a VAC ban! Watching demos is fine.

release.name: AfxHookSource2

changes.change: Fixed mirv_input cfg smooth start position.
Removed commas in mirv_campath print to make copy and paste easier.
Renamed DLL back from AfxHookSource2_IF_YOU_USE_THIS_TO_JOIN_GOTV_OR_VAC_SERVERS_YOU_WILL_GET_VAC_BANNED.dll to AfxHookSource2.dll, since Valve seems to have addressed the issue.

release.comments: While we believe that Valve addressed the issue of -insecure not working in CS2 in some circumstances, we are not sure, so please make sure to not connect to live CSTV servers or game servers in order to avoid a VAC ban! Watching demos is fine.

changes.change: Added mirv_input cfg smooth.
Renamed DLL to inject, to make it clear that you can get VAC banned if you join servers despite -insecure mode (probably new CS2 bug).
Adjusted to CS2 updated. PS: they broke old demos again.
Added mirv_skip (thanks @ficcialfaint).
Fixed mirv_cmd, mirv_campath ticks / demo time being broken / wrong.
Updated mirv_cmd to support sub-tick in CS2 too.
Added mirv_camio.
Added mirv_cmd.
Fixed mirv_campath using real time instead of game time.
Updated mirv_campath to recognize demo time and tick.
Adjusted to CS2 update.
Added mirv_input.
Fixed mirv_campath not working with latest CS2 update.

Added mirv_campath. There's currently no mirv_input camera, so you can only make campaths on a map or in a HLTV demo I think. You could work around mirv_input missing for POV demos using mirv_cvar_unhide_all, cl_demoviewoverride 1, and setang / setang_exact (because you can't rotate the view otherwise) or similar tricks maybe.
Removed auto cvar / cmd unlock.
Added mirv_cvar_unhide_all.
Added mirv_suppress_disconnects.

First version. Can not do much, all it currently does is unlock hidden / protected cvars and cmds in CS2 when used with custom loader:
ProgramPath: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Global Offensive\game\bin\win64\cs2.exe
CommandLine: -steam -insecure +sv_lan 1 -console -novid -window -w 1920 -h 1080
DLLs to inject: hlae-folder\x64\AfxHookSource2.dll
